00035 class IPMPDescriptor: public IIPMPDescriptor {
00036 public:
00039   IPMPDescriptor(): ipmpDescriptorID(0), toolID(), controlP(0), seqCode(0),

00041   }

00052   IPMPDescriptor(const Bit32T& id, const Bit128T& tID, const ByteT& control,
00053     const ByteT& sCode, const ByteSeq& ipmp, ISigCertContainer* cont):
00054     ipmpDescriptorID(id), toolID(tID), controlP(control), seqCode(sCode),
00055     ipmpData(ipmp), sigCert(cont) {
00056   }
00057 
00058   virtual ~IPMPDescriptor() {
00059     if (sigCert != 0) delete sigCert; sigCert = 0;
00060   }

00069     return ipmpDescriptorID;

00207   virtual bool CreateSigCertContainer(ISigCertContainer** container) {
00208     if (sigCert != 0) delete sigCert;
00209     sigCert = new SigCertContainer();
00210     *container = sigCert;
00211     return true;
00212   }
00213 
00220   bool Encode(ByteSeq& encoded) {
00221     ByteSeq tmp(GetIPMPDescriptorID());
00222     tmp += ByteSeq(GetIPMPToolID());
00223     tmp += GetControlPoint();
00224     tmp += GetSequenceCode();
00225     if (GetIPMPData().GetLength() >= (1 << 16)) {
00226       return false;
00227     }
00228     tmp += ByteSeq((UInt16T)(GetIPMPData().GetLength()));
00229     tmp += GetIPMPData();
00230 
00231     if (GetSigCertContainer() != 0) {
00232       tmp += (ByteT)(0x80);
00233       ByteSeq sigEnc;
00234       if (GetSigCertContainer()->MPEG2Encode(sigEnc) == false) {
00235         return false;
00236       }
00237       tmp += sigEnc;
00238     } else {
00239       tmp += (ByteT)(0x0);
00240     }
00241 
00242     //  Since rights data can easily become larger than 2^8, we have to
00243     //  increase allowed size of the IPMP descriptor. And this is definitely
00244     //  a bug in the specifications, cause the size of an IPMP descriptor
00245     //  is limited to 2^8, while at the same time size of contained IPMP
00246     //  data is limited to 2^16.
00247 /*
00248     if (tmp.GetLength() > (1 << 8)) {
00249       return false;
00250     }
00251 */
00252     if (tmp.GetLength() > (1 << 16)) {
00253       return false;
00254     }
00255 //    encoded = ByteSeq((ByteT)41) + ByteSeq((ByteT)(tmp.GetLength())) + tmp;
00256     encoded = ByteSeq((ByteT)41) + ByteSeq((UInt16T)(tmp.GetLength())) + tmp;
00257     return true;
00258   }
00259 
00260 private:
00261   Bit32T ipmpDescriptorID;
00262   Bit128T toolID;
00263   ByteT controlP;
00264   ByteT seqCode;
00265   ByteSeq ipmpData;
00266   ISigCertContainer* sigCert;
00267 };
